translations.chinese: 今某之業所就孰與仲多？」
translations.english: Now whose achievement that I have accomplished is greater, mine or brother Zhong's?"

translations.chinese: 殿上群臣皆稱萬歲，大笑為樂。
translations.english: The ministers in the hall all shouted ten thousand years and laughed with great joy.

translations.chinese: 十一月，徙齊楚大族昭氏、屈氏、景氏、懷氏、田氏五姓關中，與利田宅。
translations.english: In the eleventh month, he moved the great clans of Qi and Chu - the Zhao, Qu, Jing, Huai, and Tian surnames - to Guanzhong, and gave them beneficial fields and homes.
In the twelfth month, he traveled to Luoyang.

translations.chinese: 貫高等謀逆發覺，逮捕高等，并捕趙王敖下獄。
translations.english: Guan Gao and others' plot of rebellion was discovered. He arrested Gao and others, and also captured King Zhao Ao and threw him in prison.
